title: Cryptoababe
author: Cryptoababe
content: We all know that Crypto is a long term investment but not all. Many people buy memecoins and some other coins with no use case to make money but they listen to influencers and keep holding after making huge profit to later end up at loss. Always remember that these Altcoins cannot continue to go up forever. Selling at profit will surely make you buy more at low price if you believe in the project. Also, selling is important in most cases because its same as taking profit which is risk management, brings peace of mind and lock you in gains..Selling at the right time also allow you to diversify your portfolio. Note : This isn't a financial advice but my own strong opinion according to my experience.

Always remember that these Altcoins cannot continue to go up forever. Selling at profit will surely make you buy more at low price if you believe in the project. With altcoins, there is nothing wrong with your advise because that is what most of the people who create these numerous altcoins do... they dump their altcoins, convert the money to stablecoins or Bitcoin and leave their investors with the bag of shitcoins. So anyone investing in altcoins should know that the main aim will be to sell as quickly as possible to avoid holding the bag of shitcoins. However, while I advice people to sell their altcoins as quickly as possible, I encourage people to hold Bitcoin for long because that is how to make better profit.

comments.body: Crypto is a long time investment as per say but as a volatile asset, one needs to know when to sell while holding as not to be a shitcoin dump bag. At this point one needs to be very observant to sell when the price and liquidity is getting high and invest in Bitcoin because Bitcoin is a long time investment with a guarantee of return on investment while holding for a long time.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptoababe on October 11, 2023, 01:31:10 PMWe all know that Crypto is a long term investment but not all. Always remember that these Altcoins cannot continue to go up forever. Selling at profit will surely make you buy more at low price if you believe in the project. If you don't buy those projects you won't be bothered about what's happening to their price, memecoin are a complete waste of time. Just know that whenever you buy those memecoin you're taking a high risk that usually ends with you losing your money. Those projects are a complete gamble so unless you're not gambling don't buy them and think you're making investment. Memecoin are tools for pumping and dumping by whales and since you're a small investor (when comparing the amount of capital they're using to buy) you'll always end up at the end of the food chain as they use you to exit liquidity. Altcoins aren't meant to be held, you can trade some high market valued ones but do note, you're taking a risk doing so and only Invest in Bitcoin for hodling, if you're holding you won't be bothered about selling or taking profits. Hodling altcoins doesn't guarantee you'll make profit on the future as Bitcoin recovers, only Hodling Bitcoin does. QuoteAlso, selling is important in most cases because its same as taking profit which is risk management, brings peace of mind and lock you in gains..Selling at the right time also allow you to diversify your portfolio.While speaking about diversifying your portfolio, investing in altcoins isn't diversifying your portfolio as you're still investing in a market that has correlation. When Bitcoin increase in value or decreases it affects all other cryptocurency. They are rely on Bitcoin so you're not diversifying but throwaway your money as those projects might never recover when they get dump as Bitcoin experience a correction. Diversify outside of cryptocurrency ny Investing into other assets, that's proper risk management. You can also sell some of your Bitcoin to hold cash that can be reinvest when the market experiment a correction or use for other investment.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: When you buy altcoins, the most important thing is when to buy and not when to sell. Always try to buy at the bottom and not at the candle or the green candle. If the candle is red and the price stabilizes and you search for the project and find that it is worth investing in, then it is the right moment to buy, and when the price returns to normal, sell. Get your capital back and continue doing so for long periods until you achieve reasonable profits. If the price rises insanely, sell all at once.this is difference from bitcoin when you can make profits at buying or selling
